name: acme
description: Web app skeleton implementation, with authentication, users handling and common web app facilities
author: marcolino

scripts.start-dev-reloading: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --ignore client/ -w '.' -w .env -x 'node server.js || touch server.js'
scripts.inject-production: NODE_ENV=production node scripts/inject.js # TODO: do we need to force production?
scripts.test: nyc --reporter=html mocha --exit --timeout 10000 --slow 150 --recursive test | tee test/log/last.log; scripts/test2badge
scripts.i18n-check: grep __STRING_NOT_TRANSLATED__ --quiet src/locales/*/translation.json && ( echo 'Some texts must be translated!'; false ) || true
scripts.deadfiles-check: npx deadfile ./server.js --dir src/ --ci --exclude locales --exclude misc --exclude templates
scripts.docker-run: #TODO: no sense to use production server url, use always localhost:5000 as server url! - docker run --network='host' --env-file .env -e NODE_ENV=production acmeserver
scripts.fly-deploy: NODE_ENV=$(grep NODE_ENV .env | cut -d '=' -f2) echo $NODE_ENV && fly deploy
scripts.fly: yarn fly-upgrade && yarn fly-import-secrets && yarn docker-build && yarn fly-deploy && yarn fly-logs
